item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Property_Type Service Datatype Description A schedule property type is used to allow for a standardized method of defining network storage schedules. Local description A type's description, for example 'Date for the schedule to start.'. Type: string id A schedule property type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyname A schedule property type's key name, for example 'START_DATE'. Type: string
